name: s2len

stmt.origin: cats1len(cs2(c0, c1), nat2, cs1(c0), c1, nat1)
stmt.pretty: cats1len(<" c0 . c1 ">, nat2, <" c0 ">, c1, nat1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)), nat2)
-| wceq(cs2(c0, c1), co(cs1(c0), cconcat, cs1(c1)))
-| wcel(cs1(c0), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cfv(chash, cs1(c0)), nat1)
-| wceq(co(nat1, caddc, nat1), nat2)
